subject: Introduction of provisions of DRB in ongoing projects - Corrigendum reg.
text: HR7y <7etq <THNfxifearut 74q Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (sc qRae7 ai {arf 44q4) 547 Fax : 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 4-5 Q 6, #aer-10, ERqM, T fecrit-110075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines / Dispute Resolution & Legal Matters/ 2020 No.2.1.38/2020 date the 13th 2020 (Decision taken on e-File No.NHAI/DRB/202O (Computer No.3033) Corrigendum Sub: Introduction of provisions of DRB in ongoing projects With the approval of Competent Authority, the following Corrigendum is issued to the Policy Guidelines No.2.1.37/2020 dated 16.03.2020 and its enclosures: The "Dispute Review Board" wherever appearing shall be replaced with/ read as the "Dispute Resolution Board" (ii) The word "PPP" wherever appearing shall be read as "HAM/EPC/PPP" as DRB is to be introduced in all ongoing contracts/projects (PPP/HAM/EPC/Item Rate): 2. The aforesaid corrigendum shall be taken into consideration by all concerned. (S.K. Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: (i) All Officers at HQ/ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices. (ii) Hindi Officer for Translation in Hindi. (iii) Library for hosting the circular in library site. M41 Ri Ri WT NHAI May,
